text: Vyacheslav Semyonov (, ; 18 August 1947 – 12 August 2022) was a Ukrainian footballer. He played as a midfielder or striker. He played for the Soviet Union national football team in 1972, making eleven appearances and four goals. He won a bronze medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Semyonov died on 12 August 2022, six days before his 74th birthday.Помер динамовець В'ячеслав Семенов. title: Vyacheslav Semyonov
